ComicInfo.Summary:
SHATTERED REFLECTIONS - Part Two
As Calie's search to defeat Wonderland continues, she finds herself faced with god-like entities who will set her on a path she never could have seen coming. But when a new 'Alice' rises, will Calie be ready to face the challenge or will she finally fall victim to the madness? The countdown to WONDERLAND #25 continues.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sheldon Goh & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | B | Cover B | Andrea Errico & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena & Mirka Andolfo | 3 |
